pages.title: Kamen Rider Dark Aguilera
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Jeanne & Kamen Rider Aguilera with Girls Remix (2022, TTFC special)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:revice/devices/week_endriver#dark_week_endriver)Week Endriver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch VI$(li)Strength IX (with empty hand)$(li)Speed II$(li)Anti Poison$(li)Haste II$(li)Flying
